td.content: s:female student aged 24 years complained of moderate nausea, moderate constipation, moderate abdominal pain and Stomach. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. she denies drinking alcohol she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 176 cm, Weight 64.2 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Abdomen = distended and tender, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dicyclomine - 20 mg 4 x day, and ordered C. Difficile Toxin, A+B in Stool Culture, Ova and Parasites, Stool.

td.content: s:patient describes recurrent moderate nausea over the past month. The patient reports moderate constipation, moderate abdominal pain. she is a 25 year old white female student. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she has a history of smoking o:Height 176 cm, Weight 63.4 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Abdomen = distended and tender, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dicyclomine - 20 mg 4 x day, and ordered C.
